statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT category_name, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE feedback_count > 50;
SELECT id, category_name, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT category_name, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, category_name, created_at, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_categories WHERE feedback_count > 50 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM feedback_categories WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT category_name, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE feedback_count < 20 ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT id, category_name, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, feedback_count FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%support%' ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackCategories;
SELECT category_name FROM FeedbackCategories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT tag_name, category_name FROM FeedbackTags INNER JOIN FeedbackCategories ON FeedbackTags.category_id = FeedbackCategories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackCategories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name, category_name FROM FeedbackTags INNER JOIN FeedbackCategories ON FeedbackTags.category_id = FeedbackCategories.category_id;
SELECT category_name FROM FeedbackCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_categories FROM FeedbackCategories;
SELECT * FROM feedback_entries;
SELECT entry_id, feedback, created_at FROM feedback_entries WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_categories WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name, tag_id FROM tags WHERE tag_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_categories JOIN feedback_entries ON feedback_categories.id = feedback_entries.category_id
SELECT feedback, created_at FROM feedback_entries WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM tags JOIN feedback_entries ON tags.tag_id = feedback_entries.category_id GROUP BY tag_name
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_categories LEFT JOIN feedback_entries ON feedback_categories.id = feedback_entries.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT category_name, feedback FROM feedback_categories JOIN feedback_entries ON feedback_categories.id = feedback_entries.category_id WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT entry_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_entries WHERE entry_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(tag_id) AS tag_count FROM feedback_tags GROUP BY tag_name HAVING COUNT(tag_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_categories;
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT entry_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_entries WHERE entry_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS entry_count FROM feedback_categories JOIN feedback_entries ON feedback_categories.category_id = feedback_entries.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY entry_count DESC;

SELECT tag_name, feedback_text FROM tags INNER JOIN feedback_tags ON tags.tag_id = feedback_tags.tag_id INNER JOIN feedback_entries ON feedback_tags.entry_id = feedback_entries.entry_id WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_categories;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM feedback_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT entry_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_entries WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM user_feedback_authors ORDER BY author_name;
SELECT * FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT entry_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_entries WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT ft.tag_name, fe.feedback_text FROM feedback_tags ft JOIN feedback_taggings ftag ON ft.tag_id = ftag.tag_id JOIN feedback_entries fe ON ftag.entry_id = fe.entry_id;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(entry_id) AS total_entries FROM user_feedback_authors ufa JOIN feedback_entries fe ON ufa.author_id = fe.entry_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_entries DESC;

SELECT fc.category_name, COUNT(ft.tag_id) AS total_tags FROM feedback_categories fc JOIN feedback_entries fe ON fc.category_id = fe.category_id JOIN feedback_taggings ftag ON ftag.entry_id = fe.entry_id JOIN feedback_tags ft ON ftag.tag_id = ft.tag_id GROUP BY fc.category_name ORDER BY total_tags DESC;
